artist: Artist: Veronika Schäpers; Author: Akutagawa Ryūnosuke (Chōkōdō Shujin)
description: semi-opaque vinyl portfolio with metal studs and thin plastic tubing; white soft-cover portfolio containing 16 pages; lender's archive #109
markings: Numbered in pencil (twice) on colophon page: 17; orange chop on colophon page
medium: Photographic abstractions; letterpress; with Japanese binding of vellum, kozo-gampi cardboard, PVC jelly film, silicon cords, and neodymium magnets
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Veronika Schäpers
title: Die Nase (The Nose)
